Ready to Sell?

A Quick Rundown

Tell us about your property

Fill out a quick and obligation-free form with details about the property you want to sell. We take time to understand your needs and goals and ensure you receive the treatment you deserve.

Receive a personalized offer

We’ll craft a personalized offer for buying your property. You can expect full transparency and no hidden fees.

Sit back! We’ll take care of it

After you agree on a price, our team handles all of the transaction coordination. You can sit back and relax—We’ll handle the rest!

Get paid!

After we finalize the deal via signing closing docs, you will receive the money. Attorneys handle all the paperwork to secure a friction free transaction from start to finish.

Why pay an agent?

Frequently Asked

Questions

Can I request a blind offer?

At NewMetro, we want to ensure people really enjoy working with us. Therefore, we don’t send out blind offers. However, if we mutually decide to collaborate, we will set the price and terms together. From there, we will move forward as partners instead of just having a transactional relationship.

This offer sounds too good to be true.
What’s the deal?

There’s no hidden catch or agenda. We understand that some agents tend to represent the property-selling process as far more complicated than it really is. Moreover, they rarely treat clients as human beings. For many agents, making a profit is the only goal.

Our mission is to show that there’s a better way than that. We want to secure fair cash offers and hassle-free transaction processes for the people we collaborate with.

What types of properties does
NewMetro purchase?

NewMetro is a real estate acquisition company with a wide-ranging interest in various property types.

We purchase:

  • Land
  • Commercial Real Estate
  • Residential properties
  • Apartments
  • Multi-family Residences
  • And more

    • If you’re unsure whether we’ll be interested in purchasing your property, we encourage you to fill out a form. It's a no-obligation, easy-to-complete process that asks for basic information about your property, which helps our team to provide you with a detailed answer.

    Are there any costs or fees I’ll
    need to pay if I request an offer?

    From the moment you reach out to us with your property details to the point of receiving your offer, NewMetro will never ask you to pay for any assessments, service charges, or hidden fees

    How do we sign documents?

    We aim to ensure a frictionless process for signing documents, treating you the way we would want to be treated. We utilize DocuSign for the initial agreement. Following this, we arrange for a mobile notary to meet you at your preferred location to sign the closing documents. Once signed, the notary returns everything to the closing attorney. After the property and the deed are recorded, the closing attorney finalizes the transaction by sending you your check. Rest assured, our goal is to make this process as smooth and stress-free as possible for you.

    How do you calculate an estimated
    offer for my property?

    We consider various factors, including current market conditions, the property's location, condition, and any unique features or challenges it may present. We also consider comparable property prices in your area to ensure our offer is competitive and fair.

    At NewMetro we're committed to providing you with a seamless and stress-free experience.
